theme: Uber driver's secret $1500/month side hustle using passenger pickup locations and gym TVs

avatar_style.persona: Street-smart, resourceful character who discovered an untapped revenue stream
avatar_style.wardrobe: Casual driver gear - hoodie, cap, relatable working-class aesthetic
avatar_style.setting: Real car interior, authentic street locations, gym environments

script.speaker: host
script.line: I made $1,847 last month. Not from rides. From the screens at pickup locations.
script.broll_cue: Driver counting cash in car, gym with multiple TVs visible in background through car window

script.speaker: host
script.line: While waiting for passengers outside gyms, I noticed all these dead screens. That's when I found Trillboards.
script.broll_cue: Driver parked outside gym, pointing at unused TV screens inside through windows, opens phone app

script.speaker: host
script.line: Every gym has 10-15 TVs. Most just show news nobody watches. I set up local business ads during peak hours when I'm waiting anyway.
script.broll_cue: Driver walking into gym, scanning QR codes on multiple TVs with Trillboards app, gym members ignoring screens

script.speaker: host
script.line: The genius part? Gyms pay me to advertise local supplements, protein shops, massage therapy. I'm there 3-4 hours daily anyway.
script.broll_cue: Driver showing Trillboards earnings dashboard, gym TVs displaying local business ads, pointing to consistent schedule

script.speaker: host
script.line: Now I pull $300-400 extra weekly. Same waiting time, but the screens work for me. My Uber income just doubled.
script.broll_cue: Driver showing phone with $347 weekly earnings, satisfied expression while parked outside busy gym, cash counting

script.speaker: host
script.line: If you drive rideshare and wait at gyms, cafes, or busy spots - you're missing out. Turn dead time into dead profit.
script.broll_cue: Driver confidently walking away from gym with multiple TVs cycling through local ads, getting into car

trillboards_touchpoints.action: Notices dead screens while waiting for passengers
trillboards_touchpoints.why_it_helps: Trillboards turns waiting time into earning time.

trillboards_touchpoints.action: Quickly sets up multiple gym TVs with local ads
trillboards_touchpoints.why_it_helps: One location, multiple revenue streams in minutes.

trillboards_touchpoints.action: Shows consistent weekly earnings from same locations

constraints_and_risks: Emphasize win-win scenarios with gym owners

metrics_hypothesis.shareability_notes: Relatable gig economy angle + specific earnings + clever location strategy

alt_hooks: This rideshare hack doubled my income
Gyms don't know their TVs are worth $400/week
I make more from gym screens than Uber rides

rights_and_clearance_notes: Legitimate business model - focus on mutually beneficial arrangements

scene_breakdown.prompt_text: A focused rideshare driver in a car counting a stack of cash with a satisfied expression. Through the car window, a modern gym with multiple bright TV screens is visible. The driver looks directly at camera with confidence. The setting suggests they're parked outside waiting for passengers.
scene_breakdown.continuity_notes: Establish the rideshare driver identity and hint at the gym connection
scene_breakdown.camera_instruction: Medium shot through car windshield, then close-up on cash counting
scene_breakdown.lighting_notes: Natural lighting with gym's bright interior visible in background

scene_breakdown.prompt_text: The same driver steps out of their car and walks toward a busy gym entrance. Multiple large TV screens are clearly visible through the gym's windows, most showing boring news or blank screens. The driver pulls out their phone and opens the Trillboards app, looking at the unused screen potential.
scene_breakdown.continuity_notes: Show the discovery moment and transition to the method
scene_breakdown.camera_instruction: Following shot as driver approaches gym, then over-shoulder of phone screen
scene_breakdown.lighting_notes: Bright gym interior lighting contrasting with outside

scene_breakdown.prompt_text: Inside the gym, the driver quickly and discreetly scans QR codes on multiple TV screens using their phone. The gym is busy with people working out, mostly ignoring the screens. Each scan shows the Trillboards app confirming setup of local business advertisements.
scene_breakdown.continuity_notes: Show the setup process in action
scene_breakdown.camera_instruction: Quick cuts between scanning actions, close-ups on phone screen confirmations
scene_breakdown.lighting_notes: Typical gym fluorescent lighting, phone screen brightness

scene_breakdown.prompt_text: The gym TVs now display vibrant local business ads - supplement stores, massage therapy, protein shops. The driver shows their Trillboards earnings dashboard on phone with clear weekly totals: $347, $298, $412. People in the gym background are now occasionally glancing at the relevant local ads.
scene_breakdown.continuity_notes: Show the results and earnings proof
scene_breakdown.camera_instruction: Wide shot of multiple TVs with ads, then close-up on earnings screen
scene_breakdown.lighting_notes: TV screen brightness illuminating surrounding area

scene_breakdown.prompt_text: The driver walks confidently back to their car, passing the gym windows where the TVs continue cycling through local advertisements. They get in the car, count more cash, and look directly at the camera with a knowing smile. The final shot shows them driving away while the gym's profitable screen network operates in the background.
scene_breakdown.continuity_notes: Conclude with success and call to action
scene_breakdown.camera_instruction: Following shot to car, then close-up on final cash count and direct look
scene_breakdown.lighting_notes: Evening lighting with gym's bright screens visible in background
